Class Label

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eteks.sweethome3d.model.HomeObject

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Elevatable, Selectable, Serializable, Cloneable

    public class Label
extends HomeObject
implements Selectable, Elevatable
    A free label.

    Emmanuel Puybaret

      • getPitch

        public Float getPitch()
        Returns the pitch angle in radians used to rotate this label around horizontal axis in 3D.
        Returns:
        an angle in radians or null if the label shouldn't be displayed in 3D. A pitch angle equal to 0 should make this label fully visible when seen from top.
        Since:
        5.0

      • setPitch

        public void setPitch(Float pitch)
        Sets the angle in radians used to rotate this label around horizontal axis in 3D. Once this label is updated, listeners added to this label will receive a change notification.
        Since:
        5.0
